Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-25580 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-15
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-25580 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-15. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package qt5-qtbase is earlier than 5.12.11-15, affected by CVE-2024-25580
